page.shortlink: api a5 field get key columns function
page.description: Return the name of the 'primary key' columns of a .dbf table. .dbf tables do not use primary keys. However, you can infer the 'primary key' if the table has an auto-increment column, or a 'unique value' field rules.

argument.name: dbfTableName
argument.description: The table to query for 'primary key' columns.
